## Source: ossf-package-analysis (332aa89488a5ecb7012588f98648ef97de374565f906dfc69ff80d4d344e9a03)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'internal-plugin-lifecycle-card' @ 99.9.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
